page.title: 10VILLAGE FETE:DANE END & AREA
page.content: On the 15th June, 1985, the{annual {village fete,}at which all the local clubs and organisations have a stall, was held at{Little Munden}School.Canon Bennett, who used to be the Rector, opened the fete. The school children did country dancing, maypole dancing and a Mummer's play. {REPORT BY ADRIAN:}I met Andrew and James by the Guide's stall. Andrew had a go on the ladder stall and scored 830 which put him in pole position. We then went to the Youth Club sweet and drink stall. I had a pineapple drink, traffic light lolly and dracula fang and then it was time to get ready for the Mummer's play. The play didn't go exactly to plan because I broke the Turkish Knight's balsa wood sword during a duel! A collection by the children raised Â£20 for{Bangladesh {Flood victims.
